english.segment1: I wanna be a rock star. But, I ain't got what it takes. The drive and the determination. And the lucky breaks. I wanna be a rock star. But, I ain't got the face. I wanna be a rock star. But, I ain't got what it takes
english.segment2: Seeing my face up on the TV. Hearing my songs on the radio. People waiting all day in line to see me. Doing my pose for Rolling Stone
english.segment3: Well, it's alright, yeah it's alright
english.segment4: Living lifestyles of the rich and famous. Turning all heads in the music scene. Flying in my own jet plane to Vegas. Riding in a big black limousine
english.segment5: Well, it's alright, yeah it's alright
english.segment6: No, I ain't got nothing. But, to you I'm something. Something so much more
